ru.sharovse.spring.utils.db.values.annotations

Annotation Type ValueDb


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface ValueDb
    Read value to field from DB annotation. Mandatory properties:
    1. JDBC DataSource for fetching values.
      • dataSourceBean() or
      • dataSourceAnnotation() (recommended)
    2. valueSql() - Script SQL.
    Fetching value strategy:
    1. Single value into single object, array or list
    2. Map columns and values - one row
    3. Map columns and values - list rows

    Single value into single object, array or list

    Property valueColumnNumber() or valueColumnName() answer on question, what column of RecordSet will fetch. By default used valueColumnNumber()=1. First column. valueColumnName() set name column RecordSet and have priority over valueColumnNumber().

    Example, 
     @ValueDb(valueSql = "select VALUE from AP_USERSETTING where CODE='ID'", dataSourceBean = Config.DB_SMFF)
 private String id;
 
 @ValueDb(valueSql = "select VALUE from AP_USERSETTING where CODE=upper(:name)", dataSourceBean = Config.DB_SMFF)
 String service_id;
 
 @ValueDb(valueSql = "select * from AP_USERSETTING where CODE='SERVICE_ID'", dataSourceBean = Config.DB_SMFF)
 String serviceId;
 
 @ValueDb(valueSql = "select value from AP_USERSETTING", dataSourceBean = Config.DB_SMFF)
 Object[] values;
 
 @ValueDb(valueSql = "select code, value from AP_USERSETTING", dataSourceBean = Config.DB_SMFF, valueColumnName = "VALUE")
 List<Object> list;

    Map columns and values - one row

    First (single) row of RecordSet will write as Map<Column,Object>, where Column is String uppercase name column of RecordSet.

    Example. 
     @ValueDb(valueSql = "select * from AP_USERSETTING where CODE='SERVICE_ID'", dataSourceBean = Config.DB_SMFF)
 private Map<String, Object> colums;

    Map columns and values - list rows

    List rows of RecorSet fetch into List<Map<Columns, Object>>.

    Example, 
            @ValueDb(valueSql="select code, value from AP_USERSETTING"
                        , dataSourceBean=Config.DB_SMFF)
        List<Map<String, Object>> maps; *
    Author:
    sharov1-se

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String valueSql
      Script SQL for fetching values.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String argPropertyName
      Set name argument in valueSql().
      String dataSourceAnnotation
      Set symbolic link onto name embedded Datasource created annotation ValueDbDriverManagerDataSource.
      String dataSourceBean
      Set symbolic link onto bean DataSource.
      String valueColumnName
      Name column RecorSet.
      int valueColumnNumber
      Number column that will fetch from RecortSet.

    • Element Detail

      • valueSql

        public abstract String valueSql
        Script SQL for fetching values.

        Used DataSource dataSourceBean() or dataSourceAnnotation(). This is NamedParameterJdbcTemplate with one argument - name field. Default name argument watch in argPropertyName().

        Example 
         select VALUE from AP_USERSETTING where CODE=upper(:name)
        Returns:
        filename

      • dataSourceBean

        public abstract String dataSourceBean
        Set symbolic link onto bean DataSource. Fetched value is not available in @Value Spring-EL. Otherwise use dataSourceAnnotation().
        Returns:
        DataSource link to bean name.
        Default:
        ""

      • dataSourceAnnotation

        public abstract String dataSourceAnnotation
        Set symbolic link onto name embedded Datasource created annotation ValueDbDriverManagerDataSource.
        Returns:
        DataSource link to name annotation ValueDbDriverManagerDataSource).
        Default:
        ""

      • argPropertyName

        public abstract String argPropertyName
        Set name argument in valueSql(). Default "name". Example ":name".
        Returns:
        name argument with name annotited property.
        Default:
        "name"

      • valueColumnNumber

        public abstract int valueColumnNumber
        Number column that will fetch from RecortSet. Default 1 - first column.
        Returns:
        number.
        Default:
        1

      • valueColumnName

        public abstract String valueColumnName
        Name column RecorSet. This property overwrite valueColumnNumber().
        Returns:
        characters.
        Default:
        ""
